ygData.messageBody:
It is my belief that magi(all casting classes) should be the
knowledge base for the lore(history/myths) of the EQ world. So
below is my growing list of summerized Q & A's from this list.
Please feel free to use it to impress you friends. Remember
we are wizards keeper of knowledge, destroyer of worlds.

If you see something missing or just wrong please reply and
I will save all subjects that contain "Tome of Magi".

5-16-99 Changed Woven and Netted armor info.
Updated Skull of Jhen Tra info.
Added new item Hollow Skull.
Added Skills vs Spells list.

Tome of Magi V1.2

Quests
----------------------
Chanda Miller Bear Hide Armor. Killing Paw Gnolls and
Bandits will raise faction with the
Karana Residents. CAN be used by wizards.


MISC
----------------------
Class Specific Skills Evo, Channel, Div, Abj, Etc.
= ((Level + 1) * 5)
Offense = (Level * 4)
Defense = ((Level * 4) + 1)
Weapons Pierce, 2/1h Blunt = ((Level + 1)*3)


Spells
----------------------
Most Spells Found somewhere in the city of Erudin &
Felwithe check every merchant.
Pillar of Fire Located at Erudin Library or Research it.
Root Max out Alteration and use on White con'd
or below.
Alter Plain of Hate 44 level spell for plane travel
Alter Plain of Sky 44 level spell for plane travel
Fire&Ice Remember that some monster while not
affected by ice can be hurt by fire.
Shock spells Do less damage then bolt but have better
damage to mana ratio
Bolt spells Do more damage cost more mana and must be
aimed correctly
Targeting When using AE or PE spells try to target
your tank to avoid getting targeted
